title: Evasive Footwork
content:
3. Evasive Footwork works with a Superiority Dice to fuel it. Features provide unique abilities that are inherent to a Character's Race, Class, Background selected. These may vary greatly, from allowing you to equip certain Weapons or pieces of Armor with Proficiency, to add your Proficiency Bonus to certain Saving Throws.

Evasive Footwork Information

You can evade attacks by imposing Disadvantage on melee attacks against you for a round.
